content:
Hey I filed an MCP and for some reason it wasn’t tagged despite using the template. I don’t know if it was because it was through the GitHub app, but would someone be able to tag it appropriately?

https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/issues/366
@XAMPPRocky I'm not sure why exactly I have permission to do so, but done. :)
Also, props to whoever made the bot automatically pick up on anything that gets labeled with the label.
